sys_script_include.description: Accepts a caseId, returns a GlideRecord for the email which originally opened the given case. Returns null if no such email could be found
sys_script_include.name: getCaseCreationEmail

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b44868a01b67b010749f0dc5604bcb0b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_clgp_mail_to_acc.getCaseCreationEmail</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Accepts a caseId, returns a GlideRecord for the email which originally opened the given case. Returns null if no such email could be found</description><name>getCaseCreationEmail</name><script><![CDATA[function getCaseCreationEmail(caseId){
	var acceptableReceiveTypes = ['forward', 'new'];
	
	var emailGr = new GlideRecord('sys_email');
	emailGr.addQuery('instance', caseId);
	emailGr.addQuery('instance.contact_type', 'email');
	emailGr.addQuery('type', 'received');
	emailGr.addQuery('state', 'processed');
	emailGr.addQuery('receive_type', 'IN', acceptableReceiveTypes);
	
	// Only take the first email associated
	emailGr.orderBy('sys_created_on');
	emailGr.setLimit(1);
	
	emailGr.query();
	emailGr.next();
	
	return emailGr.isValidRecord()
		? emailGr
		: null;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Chris.Crockett@CloudGoServices.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-28 15:59:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>b44868a01b67b010749f0dc5604bcb0b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCaseCreationEmail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Email-based Account Assignment for CSM" source="x_clgp_mail_to_acc">136aa4d01bebb4101738a932604bcb5d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Email-based Account Assignment for CSM">136aa4d01bebb4101738a932604bcb5d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b44868a01b67b010749f0dc5604bcb0b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Chris.Crockett@CloudGoServices.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-28 15:59:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
